children.name: Westworld (HBO)
children.description: Drama · Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

children.name: The Original
children.description: Programmer Bernard detects aberrant behavior in recently re-coded hosts; Dolores and Teddy's narrative is upended by a mysterious Man in Black.

children.name: Chestnut
children.description: Two guests arrive at the park with very different expectations; Maeve's emotions are tweaked; The Man in Black seeks help from a condemned man.

children.name: The Stray
children.description: Elise and Stubbs search for a missing host; Teddy gets a new backstory; Bernard investigates the origins of madness and hallucinations within the hosts.

children.name: Dissonance Theory
children.description: Dolores joins William and Logan on a bounty hunt; The Man in Black makes a significant discovery; Ford and Theresa discuss the park's future.

children.name: Contrapasso
children.description: Dolores, William and Logan reach Pariah, and are recruited for a dangerous mission; The Man in Black meets an unlikely ally.

children.name: The Adversary
children.description: Maeve charms Felix; Elsie discovers evidence that could point to sabotage; Teddy and the Man in Black conflict with a garrison.

children.name: Trompe L'Oeil
children.description: Dolores, William and Lawrence journey into treacherous terrain; Maeve presents her demand; Bernard considers his next move.

children.name: Trace Decay
children.description: Bernard struggles with a mandate; Teddy is troubled by dark memories; Maeve looks to change her script.

children.name: The Well-Tempered Clavier
children.description: Dolores and Bernard reconnect with their pasts; Maeve makes a bold proposition to Hector; Teddy finds enlightenment, at a price.

children.name: The Bicameral Mind
children.description: Ford unveils his bold new narrative; Dolores embraces her identity; Maeve sets her plan in motion.

children.name: Black Mirror (Netflix)
children.description: Drama · A television anthology series that shows the dark side of life and technology.

children.name: The National Anthem
children.description: Prime Minister Michael Callow faces a shocking dilemma when Princess Susannah, a much-loved member of the Royal Family, is kidnapped.

children.name: Fifteen Million Merits
children.description: In a world where people's lives consist of riding excercise bikes to gain credits, Bing tries to help a woman get on to a singing competition show.

children.name: The Entire History of You
children.description: In the near future, everyone has access to a memory implant that records everything they do, see and hear - a sort of Sky Plus for the brain. You need never forget a face again - but is that always a good thing?

children.name: Be Right Back
children.description: After learning about a new service that lets people stay in touch with the deceased, a lonely, grieving Martha reconnects with her late lover.

children.name: White Bear
children.description: Victoria wakes up and cannot remember anything about her life. Everyone she encounters refuses to communicate with her.

children.name: The Waldo Moment
children.description: A failed comedian who voices a popular cartoon bear named Waldo finds himself mixing in politics when TV executives want Waldo to run for office.

children.name: White Christmas
children.description: Three interconnected tales of technology run amok during the Christmas season are told by two men at a remote outpost in a frozen wilderness.

children.name: Nosedive
children.description: A woman desperate to boost her social media score hits the jackpot when she's invited to a swanky wedding, but the trip doesn't go as planned.

children.name: Playtest
children.description: An American traveler short on cash signs up to test a revolutionary new gaming system, but soon can't tell where the hot game ends and reality begins.

children.name: Shut Up and Dance
children.description: When withdrawn Kenny stumbles headlong into an online trap, he is quickly forced into an uneasy alliance with shifty Hector, both at the mercy of persons unknown.

children.name: San Junipero
children.description: In a seaside town in 1987, a shy young woman and an outgoing party girl strike up a powerful bond that seems to defy the laws of space and time.

children.name: Men Against Fire
children.description: Future soldiers Stripe and Raiman must protect frightened villagers from an infestation of vicious feral mutants.

children.name: Hated in the Nation
children.description: In near-future London, police detective Karin Parke, and her tech-savvy sidekick Blue, investigate a string of mysterious deaths with a sinister link to social media.

children.name: Mr. robot (USA Network)
children.description: Crime · Follows Elliot, a young programmer working as a cyber-security engineer by day, and a vigilante hacker by night.

children.name: eps1.0_hellofriend.mov
children.description: A notorious hacker takes an interest in cyber security engineer and vigilante styled computer hacker Elliot, while an evil corporation is hacked.

children.name: eps1.1_ones-and-zer0es.mpeg
children.description: Elliot is torn between accepting a lucrative yet problematic job offer and joining the fsociety hacker group.

children.name: eps1.2_d3bug.mkv
children.description: Elliot attempts to lead a normal life, but cannot escape fsociety, while Gideon grows suspicious, and Tyrell plays dirty.

children.name: eps1.3_da3m0ns.mp4
children.description: While dealing with his withdrawal, Elliot suffers a series of hallucinations about his life, while Shayla helps Angela take an unexpected trip.

children.name: eps1.4_3xpl0its.wmv
children.description: Fsociety attempts to penetrate Steel Mountain, the most secure data facility in America, while Angela makes an important decision.

children.name: eps1.5_br4ve-trave1er.asf
children.description: Elliot attempts to hack Vera out of jail in order to save someone he cares about; Tyrell's 'game´' gets crazy; and Angela digs deeper into her mother's death.

children.name: eps1.6_v1ew-s0urce.flv
children.description: Elliot misses Shayla. Angela makes a deal with Colby. Sharon Knowles has an encounter with Tyrell.

children.name: eps1.7_wh1ter0se.m4v
children.description: Allsafe is hacked and Elliot is meeting White Rose. Tyrell is interrogated by the police and Elliot remembers who he really is.

children.name: eps1.8_m1rr0r1ng.qt
children.description: Elliot has to face the challenges of his past, and become accustomed to his new found family.

children.name: eps1.9_zer0-day.avi
children.description: Another huge discovery for Elliot surrounding his family and fsociety, Tyrell's world starts to close around him and Angela has a rather unexpected visitor.

children.name: eps2.0_unm4sk-pt1.tc
children.description: Elliot keeps seeing his psychologist, Krista. The new character Susan Jacobs is having trouble with technology. Gideon pays a visit to Elliot complaining he's been targeted for a crime Elliot might have committed. Fsociety are back in action, asking E Corp for 5.9 million dollars in 24 hours.

children.name: eps2.0_unm4sk-pt2.tc
children.description: Five/nine has changed the world; Elliot is in seclusion; Angela finds happiness at Evil Corp.; fsociety delivers a malicious payload.

children.name: eps2.1_k3rnel-pan1c.ksd
children.description: Elliot vows to beat Mr. Robot; Angela gets a glimpse behind the curtain at E Corp; and fsociety stirs up trouble.

children.name: eps2.2_init_1.asec
children.description: Elliot vows to beat Mr. Robot; Angela gets a glimpse behind the curtain at E Corp; and fsociety stirs up trouble.

children.name: eps2.3_logic-b0mb.hc
children.description: Elliot can't quit the game; Dom and the FBI head to China to investigate 5/9; Joanna is haunted; and Darlene calls on Angela for help.

children.name: eps2.4_m4ster-s1ave.aes
children.description: Mr. Robot has an original way to show Elliot that he can be useful. Darlene and Angela take a shot at their plan.

children.name: eps2.5_h4ndshake.sme
children.description: Mr. Robot and Elliot try to keep the peace. Fsociety releases a video honoring Uncle Sam. Darlene acts upon an old desire.

children.name: eps2.6_succ3ss0r.p12
children.description: The latest fsociety leak has Dom trying her best to spin the case in the FBI's favor; Angela defends her career choices; Darlene makes it known that her circle of trust is shrinking.

children.name: eps2.7_init_5.fve
children.description: Angela wants more from Evil Corp; Dark Army's allegiance is in question; Elliot and Darlene seek answers.

children.name: eps2.8_h1dden-pr0cess.axx
children.description: Elliot wonders if Mr. Robot has been lying to him; Darlene attempts to do the right thing; Dom and the FBI get closer.

children.name: eps2.9_pyth0n-pt1.p7z
children.description: Angela makes an acquaintance; Dom begins seeing the scope of things; an old friend reveals everything to Elliot.

children.name: eps2.9_pyth0n-pt2.p7z
children.description: Angela makes an unexpected acquaintance; Darlene realizes she's in deep; and an old friend reveals all to Elliot.

children.name: eps3.0_power-saver-mode.h
children.description: Elliot realizes his mission, and needs help from Angela; Darlene worries about them coming out clean.

children.name: eps3.1_undo.gz
children.description: Elliot becomes encouraged trying to undo five/nine; Darlene gets stuck between a rock and a hard place; Mr. Robot sparks a panic.

children.name: eps3.2_legacy.so
children.description: The former interim CTO of E Corp returns.

children.name: eps3.3_metadata.par2
children.description: Dom has a close call; Elliot chases himself with Darlene on the lookout.
